# Vue Responsive Carousel

![NPM License](https://img.shields.io/npm/l/vue-responsive-carousel)

**Lightweight** image carousel component for  [Vue](https://vuejs.org/) **< 10k** ðŸ˜Ž <br>

![responsive-carousel](https://private-user-images.githubusercontent.com/91323932/268753208-cfd92d05-6442-4ba5-951d-fbcaff9a76b0.gif?jwt=eyJhbGciOiJIUzI1NiIsInR5cCI6IkpXVCJ9..Ao5F4g1565RyJr3AMlPO2NTCtUNtastg81cJS6P3vpU)

## Usage

`npm i vue-responsive-carousel`

```
<script setup>
import ResponsiveCarousel from 'vue-responsive-carousel';
import 'vue-responsive-carousel/dist/style.css';

const images = [
    { src: './sablon.jpg', alt: 'Sablon'},
    { src: './tree.jpg', alt: 'Tree'},
]
</script>


<template>
<ResponsiveCarousel :images="images"/>
</template
```
